name: teamproject
description: 1. you need to have npm installed 2. you need to have a db with the following credentials: user:            'companymanager_user', password:        'companymanager_user', database schema: 'testdb', 3. run "npm init -y" in your project folder 4. run "npm install express mysql2" 5. open browser and go to "http://localhost:3000/index.html" 6. submit and the tuples will appear in your db (I have included a copy of the model for the db "TestModelToImport.mwb")
